DOC.brief_title: Lactation Outcomes Among Survivors Pediatric Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Participants complete cross-sectional survey . Responses compare national sample healthy woman Project First ( Infant Feeding Practices Survey II ) . Primary Objective : - To describe breastfeed outcome ( intention , initiation , duration , wean ) among female SJLIFE protocol participant 18 year age older report live birth . Secondary Objective : - To compare breastfeed outcomes childhood cancer survivor healthy mother .
DOC.criteria: Participants SJLIFE protocol patient After Completion Therapy ( ACT ) Clinic , St. Jude Children 's Research Hospital . Female 18 year age old At least one report live birth childhood cancer diagnosis treatment . Unable read write . Unable read understand English .
